Articles.Content:
So I've been encountering a problem on GPP at 2.5x Scale when launching a Multi-relay sat launcher where the kraken gabs hold of the craft preventing it from leaving the pad. I've duplicated my mod list and placed it in a fresh GPP w/o rescale and there is no problem. So I was wondering if there was a way to release the kraken grip.

Edit : Problem semi fixed, was caused by merging of crafts. 

Mod list :

Spoiler

KSP: 1.3.1 (Win64) - Unity: 5.4.0p4 - OS: Windows 10  (10.0.0) 64bit
